title: How can I find loading adress of eCos firmware
content:
From:https://www.tendacn.com/en/download/detail-3482.html

Im trying to find loading address (entry point of my program) for this binary, which is part off this firmware. Im trying to load it inside of IDA, how can I correctly load it, how to find entry point address? binwalk's output:

comments.text: have you tried the address printed by binwalk?
yes ,it's not loading address.and i have tried to use uart address
what is the output from? it doesn't seem to match the linked file
They're the same system, slightly different(only size).They all need to be found the loading address.
